==== Joining IRC: ====
* You will need an IRC client. Some IRC clients include <nowiki>[[http://xchat.org|X-Chat]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://pidgin.im|Pidgin]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://irssi.org|Irssi]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://chatzilla.hacksrus.com|ChatZilla]]</nowiki>. You can also use the Java-based client provided by freenode <nowiki>[[http://java.freenode.net//index.php?channel=ubuntu-us-nm|here]]</nowiki>.
* Our IRC channel is <nowiki>[[irc:--chat.freenode.net-ubuntu-us-nm|#ubuntu-us-nm]]</nowiki> on chat.freenode.net.
* If you need further assistance, please refer to the Ubuntu help page on <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/InternetRelayChat|IRC]]</nowiki>

==== Miscellaneous ====

We have monthly IRC meetings the first Tuesday of each month at 9:00pm MST.

=== Agenda ===

* Rally the members
* Nail down the January date for face-to-face meeting 

Please feel free to add any agenda items!
